DataElement.preferredName: Physical Activity Occurrence Per Week Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to capture the amount of exercise during the timespan of one week.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._For each, generally denoting a ratio._Any period of seven consecutive days.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm)

Concepts.definition: Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.

Property.preferredDefinition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.:For each, generally denoting a ratio.:Any period of seven consecutive days.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
For each, generally denoting a ratio.
Any period of seven consecutive days.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network

ReferenceDocuments.name: Indicate the number of times
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate the number of times per week the patient participates in physical activity (i.e., walk or do other moderate or vigorous activity for 30+ minutes)

DataElement.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
